John Type (amụrụ n'ihe dị ka n'afọ 1972) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe.
Type tolitere na Chitungwiza, Zimbabwe wee malite ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka Kennedy Migeal na 1989
Mgbe otu afọ ma ọ bụ karịa gasịrị, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ nle onwe ya
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ zụlitela ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe ndị kwuuru onwe ha, nke gụnyere Dudzai Mushawepwere na Godfrey Kennedy
Ọrụ ụdị bụ n'ozuzu ya n'ụdị.
John na-ahọrọ ịkpụ ihe n'ụdị na-enweghị atụ ma na-eseta mmegharị nke ihe nlereanya bụla
Akụkụ nke ọ bụla ga-enwe akụkọ ịkọ, nke sitere na ahụmịhe na mkpali na gburugburu ebe obibi ya.
John kwenyere na ọ bụ Chineke nyere ya onyinye ịmepụta ụdị nka dị otú ahụ, ebe ọ bụ naanị ya n'ime ezinụlọ ya na-akpụ ihe
John nwere ikike iji ihe okike na nke ime mmụọ nke nkume mepụta ọrụ nka nke na-egosipụta mmegharị na nhazi
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ John dị na nchịkọta onwe onye gburugburu ụwa, site na Germany, Canada, Belgium, Holland, U.S
